definition: (Tw) to lower (prices, interest rates etc)/to reduce/to cut
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite

to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend

sentences.english: GE said it intended to reduce its annual dividend to 6 cents per share from 19 cents.
sentences.chinese: 奇异公司宣称将要调降年度股利19分降为每股6分。

sentences.english: The lowering of interest rates, may experts believe, would give a great boost to the house market.
sentences.chinese: 许多专家相信，利率调降可以大大的带动房市买气。
